name: Speedy Vegan - The Great Fruit Harvest
name_original: Speedy Vegan - The Great Fruit Harvest
description:
It's The Great Fruit Harvest! Speedy Vegan needs your help to gather fruit, and unlock the next level!

Speedy Vegan - The Great Fruit Harvest is a retro style platform game created in the spirit of the late 1970's, and early 1980's when video games were just beginning. It comes packed with 20 levels of non stop fun, plus 4 bonus levels for your enjoyment!

If you, or a loved one enjoy the retro style game play of the late 70's, and early 80's then Speedy Vegan - The Great Fruit Harvest is the game for you!
